token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['fans_id']=1243449718
params['tags']="测试标签"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.users.weixin.follower.tags.delete', '3.0.0', 'GET', params=params, files=files)

name: delete
